resources.string: Hello, everybody. Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Muhammad Ilyas. I was born in Bandung. I live at Jl. Jatihandap no 164, Cicaheum , Bandung. My hobbies are gaming, watch movie and read some books because i am a big fan of Dan Brown . I graduated from Vocational High School 2 Bandung , and now I am studying in Universitas Komputer Indonesia. I have pleasant personality. I am very friendly, sometimes I am shy if I met new people.
Aplikasi ini dibuat untuk memenuhi Ujian Tengah Semester mata pelajaran Aplikasi Komputasi Bergerak. Aplikasi ini berisi tentang profil pembuat, kontak pembuat, dan daftar kontak teman.
